title: What is Emedilife?
description: Emedilife is a Bangladeshi’s leading digital healthcare platform. Bangladesh is overwhelmingly going to a digital Bangladesh in recent years. Peoples are engaging more and more on digital devices and also services for its own and dear ones. In this regard, we are getting closer everyone and done many things with a single click. We know that, health is the best wealth. When we fall/face in sick, we then see how health important for human’s life. From going to hospitals, institutes or clinics; admitting and taking services from them is relentlessly need trained and knowledgeable personnel. Firstly our vision is to deliver your ordered medines without any delivery cost. Secondly, we’ll collect all doctors’ and lab tests’ information in our country . From e-appointment of Bangladeshi doctors’ at their chamber from all over the world, consultations on call and chat, online pharmacy and lab tests; what are seeming to you-we have it all covered for you. We are on a mission to bring best healthcare services in Bangladesh which give you a flawless healthcare experience. So, Happy Living.

title: Can I know whether your Pharmacy is licensed?
description: Yes, Our pharmacy is licensed by the Director-General Drug Administration office.

title: What are your hours of operation?
description: We are open around 24/7 in 365 days.

title: What is your office address and phone number?
description: Our corporate office address is Level-3, Block-L, Road-2, Banani, Dhaka-1212.

title: How do I contact Pharmacists at emedilife.com?
description: You can directly contact our pharmacists by calling our hotline number.

title: How can I save more at emedilife.com?
description: You can save more (up to 30%) by purchasing medicines, booking lab tests (up to 80%), doctors’ appointments, or doctor’s consultations(up to 50%)  from our app or website.

title: What are emedilife.com's Privacy and Security Policies?
description: Emedilife always prioritizes maintaining the privacy of its customer's information and to secure its customer's privacy, not to share or leak out any information to any other sources. In this regard, Emedilife uses HTTPS and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) encryption and for payment card security, we used a trusted SSLCOMMERZ payment gateway.

title: Do you accept any Insurance Plans?
description: No. At this moment, we are not accepting any Insurance Plans.

title: What is emedilife.com’s return and refund policy?
description: We have the easiest return and refund policy. to know more please visit/click the return and refund policy part.

title: Is it safe to use my credit/debit card at emedilife.com?
description: Yes. It’s safe to use your debit/credit card at emedilife.com/app because Emedilife uses HTTPS and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) encryption and for payment card security, we used trusted SSLCOMMERZ payment gateway.

title: Why is the image shown on the website different from the item I received?
description: It’s normal because when we put the information on our site, we tried to upload the original picture of the product. There are over 50,000 products on our site. when any company/distributor changes its packets out layers or sizes or prices we tried to upload it’s correctly instantly but if it misses, it may happen. If you get any consciousness/questions about the image or products please place a complaint through complain@emedilife.com or make a call to our hotline number and write your complaint. We’ll solve it as soon as possible.

title: Why is the original price different shown in the invoice’s price?
description: It may happen when you use ‘Promo Code’ or any campaigns running or running out. If you face such problems, please call our hotline number or place a complaint through complain@emedilife.com immediately.

title: Are medications available at emedilife.com safe?
description:
Yes, it’s 100% because we collect all medicines directly from pharmaceutical companies or authorized distributors and our pharmacists confirm the authenticity of the medications before packaging. After packaging, we use a security seal to every parcel and tag an invoice of the 
customer to the package by using its ‘Transaction ID’ and monitoring it till delivering to the customer.

title: Why do the pills I ordered from emedilife.com look different from those I get from my local pharmacy?
description: It may happen when a company changes its pack’s out layer in its latest version. If you face such problems, please call our hotline number or place a complaint through complain@emedilife.com immediately.

title: What is the meaning of Generic Drugs?
description: A generic drug is a medication created to be the same as an already marketed brand-name drug in dosage form, safety, strength, route of administration, quality, performance characteristics, and intended use.

title: Is it safe to use Generic Drugs?
description: The DGDA requires a generic drug to meet standards that ensure it's the same basic product as the brand-name drug. That means the generic drug is safe and can be taken: The same way as a brand-name drug.

title: What do the following statuses ‘IN STOCK’ and ‘OUT of STOCK’ on any product page mean?
description: In Stock means it’s available to us/market and we can serve you instantly as you placed an order and Out of Stock means it’s not available to us/market and it’s not possible now to serve you.

title: What information do you need from me to process my order as fast as possible?
description: Three basic information we need to proceed to place an order and deliver it. These are Full Name, Mobile Number, and Full Address.

title: Is there any limit on the number of prescriptions that I can upload?
description: No, there wasn't any limit to uploading your prescriptions. You can upload unlimited prescriptions of yours and order medicines as per doctor’s prescribed.

title: What forms of payment does emedilife.com accept for online orders?
description: Emedilife accepts both Cash on Delivery and Online Payments. You can place your order in two forms. One is “Cash on Delivery” and another is “Online Payments”. By using “Online Payments”, you can pay your payments through any Credit/Debit Cards, Mobile Financial Services, and any e-Wallets in Bangladesh.

title: What if I can’t find the products/medications I am looking for in your website?
description: You can call our hotline number and request to collect or hit the “Request Order” button on emedilife.com. We’ll call you for further actions immediately.

title: Is it possible to buy more than one medication in a single order at emedilife.com?
description: Yes, you can buy more than one medication in a single order at emedilife.com/app.

title: Are all your product prices quoted in Taka?
description: Yes, our all product prices are quoted in MRP and Bangladeshi Taka.

title: How is my order packaged?
description: When we get an order, we first assemble the order by region and call the procurement department to pack those with secure sealing. Every order is packed by our trained personnel by using paperboard cartoons and tag a secure seal of the wrapping area and carried by our secured water and dust resistant bag.

title: Is there any delivery charges? Are there any other hidden charges?
description: No, there has neither any delivery charges nor any hidden charges to deliver your order.

title: Does emedilife.com charge any professional fees on prescription drug orders?
description: No, there haven’t been any professional fees on prescription drug orders.

title: What if I am charged more than the actual price of my prescription drugs?
description: If you face such problems, please call our hotline number or place a complaint through complain@emedilife.com immediately.

title: Does emedilife.com deliver products to any location in Bangladesh?
description: No. emedilife.com only deliver its products to both Dhaka and Chattogram Metropolitan Area now but in the future, it has been planning to cover all over Bangladesh.

title: How long will it take to deliver my order?
description: After getting the order, we need 4-6 hours to deliver you. It will reduce and be within 30 minutes immediately within the shortest time.

title: What is Cash on Delivery (CoD)?
description: Cash on Delivery means when you get your medications, you just pay in cash to the delivery peer.

title: What are the charges for Cash-on-Delivery (CoD) payment method?
description: No charges for delivery. It’s absolutely free.

title: How do I pay by Cash on Delivery (CoD) method?
description: When you get your desired medications, you just pay the delivery peer in accordance with the invoice. We haven’t any delivery or hidden charges.

title: What are the terms and conditions for the CoD payment option?
description: There has a terms and conditions button below the website. Please see that portion.

title: What type of freight is used to ship my order containing liquid products?
description: There we use separate boxes for liquid products and maintain extra care for transporting that boxes.

title: How do I know if my order has been shipped?
description: You may monitor your order by using your profile log-in. Go through your profile and click on the “My Order” button and monitor your product's conditions.

title: How will I know the status of my order?
description: You may monitor your order by using your profile log-in. Go through your profile and click on the “My Order” button and monitor your product's conditions.

title: How do I cancel my order?
description: You may monitor your order by using your profile log-in. Go through your profile and click on the “My Order” button and now you see the Details and Cancel button. If you want to cancel your order, then you click on the Cancel button.

title: Is it possible to cancel my order after it has been charged?
description: Yes, it’s possible to cancel your order after it has been charged. In this case, if you paid us, it will be back to you within 48 hours to your respected account and if it is Cash on Delivery (CoD), it’s auto equalized.

title: Can I change my delivery address after I have placed my order?
description: Yes, it’s possible to change your delivery address after you have placed your order. In this case, you should go to your profile and change your address.

title: How will my order be delivered?
description: After getting your order, we call to precede it to the packaging department. After packing, a delivery peer is assigned to deliver it.

title: How do I reach Customer Service?
description: If you need any customer service, please call our hotline number or place a complaint through complain@emedilife.com immediately.

title: What if my product is damaged, wrong or missing?
description: If you face such problems, please call our hotline number or place a complaint through complain@emedilife.com immediately.

title: What if I am not happy with your Customer Service response?
description: If you face such problems, please call our hotline number or place a complaint through complain@emedilife.com immediately.
